actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress on the importance of the Eastern Orthodox Ecumenical Patriarchate.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Calls for the United States to: (1) continue to support the Ecumenical Patriarchate's non-political, religious mission; (2) encourage the continued maintenance of the institution's physical security needs as provided for under Turkish and international law; and (3) use its good offices to encourage the reopening of the Ecumenical Patriarchate's Halki Patriarchal School of Theology.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress on the importance of the Eastern Orthodox Ecumenical Patriarchate.
